enWisdom: Be wary of cowardice for it is indeed disgraceful and [is] a deficiency

Wisdom: إِذَا هِبْتَ أَمْراً فَقَعْ فِيهِ فَإِنَّ شِدَّةَ تَوَقِّيهِ أَشَدُّ مِنَ الْوُقُوعِ فِيهِ
enWisdom: When you are frightened of something then jump into it, for indeed the difficulty of safeguarding yourself from it is greater than [that of] entering into it

Wisdom: شِدَّةُ الْجُبْنِ مِنْ عَجْزِ النَّفْسِ وَضَعْفِ الْيَقِينِ
enWisdom: Extreme cowardice stems from impuissance of the self and weakness of conviction

Wisdom: لَا يَنْبَغِي لِلْعَاقِلِ أَنْ يُقِيمَ عَلَى الْخَوْفِ إِذَا وَجَدَ إِلَى الْأَمْنِ سَبِيلًا
enWisdom: It is not appropriate for an intelligent person to live in fear when he has found a way to [attain] security
